name: Kingston SKC3000S/1024G
description:
Kingston Solid State Drive is an advanced high performance solution. The family offers models for PCs and laptops with capacities ranging from 512 GB to 4100 GB. This SSD is able to interest demanding users, including gamers and professionals who create and process high-quality content. The drive is made in the M.2 2280 form factor, which makes it possible to install even in thin laptops.

The fast performance of the Kingston KC3000 SKC3000S/1024G 1.02TB SSD guarantees a PCI-E 4.0 4x NVMe interface, so read and write speeds can reach 7000MB/s and 6000MB/s respectively. The presence of a low-profile heat dissipator is primarily responsible for maintaining high data transfer rates without overheating. It is under it that the hardware “stuffing” of the model with fast 3D TLC NAND flash memory and the Phison E18 controller is “hidden”. Among other advantages, they are distinguished by a high level of reliability. So, the manufacturer's warranty is 5 years, and the guaranteed write resource (TBW) reaches 800 TB, which is significantly higher than the average values for the market.

name: Samsung MZ-V8P1T0BW
description:
The Samsung 980 PRO Family 1TB Internal SSD is a high performance SSD in the upper price range. It is made in a compact M.2 2280 form factor, has a light weight (about 7 grams) and small dimensions (22x80 mm), which allows it to be installed even in thin laptops. It is recommended to use the product in desktop or laptop computers with high requirements for data processing speed.

First of all, the Samsung 980 PRO MZ-V8P1T0BW 1 TB SSD is able to interest gamers who can quickly launch games without waiting for a long time to load levels. It is also suitable for professional systems used for working with graphics, analyzing large data sets, etc. The high bandwidth of the drive (up to 7000 MB / s when reading and up to 5000 MB / s when writing) is primarily provided by a modern hardware base: 3D TLC NAND flash memory and a proprietary Elpis controller. Plus, it uses a fast PCI-E 4.0 4x interface and the NVMe protocol. The advantages of the model also include a high level of reliability and durability, which is confirmed by both a 5-year official warranty and a 600 TB mean time between failures (TBW).

name: WD WDS100T3B0C
description:
The representative of Western Digital's Blue line is a high-performance solid-state drive for the mass consumer. Within its family, the model belongs to older solutions, but in general it can be attributed to the middle price segment. The SSD is made in M.2 2280 format and is equipped with a PCI-E 3.0 4x NVMe connection interface, thanks to which you can count on high data transfer rates: up to 3500 MB / s when reading, and 3000 MB / s when writing.

And this is approximately 5-6 times greater than the capabilities of SATA analogs. Thus, the WD Blue SN570 WDS100T3B0C 1TB SSD is able to interest a variety of demanding users, including amateur gamers, programmers and creative people (video editors, designers, etc.). A high level of reliability is confirmed by a 5-year official warranty and a decent guaranteed write resource (TBW) of 600 TB. In addition, for convenient monitoring of the state of the model, including temperature control and other technical parameters, a proprietary SSD Dashboard utility is proposed. In addition to the 1 TB version, you can find variations from 250 GB to 2 TB on sale.

name: Kingston Fury SFYRS/1000G
description:
The 1TB SSD represents the Renegade line, which combines Kingston's high performance and reliable (5 year warranty) solutions. The model belongs to the highest price segment and is able to interest gamers and e-sportsmen, enthusiasts and other advanced users who assemble a powerful personal computer. The drive is made in a compact M.2 form factor and includes an aluminium low-profile heatsink, which expands the scope of installation and allows you to use it even in thin gaming laptops that are sensitive to additional heat.

Also, the Kingston Fury Renegade SFYRS/1000G 1TB SSD can be installed in the PlayStation 5 to download more games and applications to the game console. The hardware basis of the model is 3D TLC NAND flash memory and a fast Phison E18 controller, which, together with the PCI-E 4.0 4x NVMe bus, will provide the highest performance with read / write speeds up to 7300/6000 MB / s, respectively. You can also count on the efficient operation of the SSD at one-time high loads (for example, copying a huge number of files at a time), because the IOPS indicators are approaching 1 million operations per second.

name: Patriot Memory PBE240GS25SSDR
description:
Patriot Memory's 240GB SSD represents the Burst line of affordable and reliable SSDs. The model is made in a classic 2.5-inch form factor and is positioned as the best solution for upgrading an old or creating a new entry-level PC. Since the thickness of the device does not exceed 7 mm, and the weight is less than 50 grams, we can consider installing it not only in a desktop, but also in a medium format laptop.

The 240GB Patriot Memory Burst Elite PBE240GS25SSDR SSD received fast 3D TLC NAND flash memory and a SATA 3 interface, thanks to which the read and write speed ratings are respectively 450MB/s and 320MB/s. By the way, in practice, speed values \u200b\u200bmay be even slightly higher. At the same time, the throughput decreases when the virtual cache overflows, which takes up about 25% of the drive capacity. The overall reliability of the device is confirmed not only by a 3-year official warranty, but also by a decent TBW of 100 TB, as well as increased up to 2 million hours of MTBF. Note that on sale there are variations in volume from 120 to 1920 GB.

name: Crucial CT500MX500SSD1
description:
One of the most successful SSD models available in 2018 based on 64-layer 3D TLC NAND flash memory and SATA 3 interface. c) and low latency when accessing a randomly selected block of data. It is positioned as a product of the middle price category, designed for use in PCs and laptops for solving household and professional tasks. Suitable for both assembling new systems and upgrading existing ones.

Made in a 2.5-inch form factor, has a standard thickness (7 mm) and can be installed in any full-sized laptops. Connects to the system using the SATA 3 interface, which is equipped with all motherboards from 2013-2019. The performant hardware basis of the Crucial MX500 CT500MX500SSD1 SSD is a 4-channel Silicon Motion SM2258 controller that supports high-speed SLC caching (up to 32 GB), progressive LDPC encoding, SMART, TRIM and NCQ technologies. The most positive impact on performance was also made by the DRAM cache, which consists of a 512 MB DDR3L-1866 chip. The manufacturer declares a guaranteed recording resource of 180 TB and gives a proprietary five-year warranty, which is valid within the resource, which allows you to record up to 98 GB of data daily.
